#include <stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main(void) {
      int t,flag;
      
      long long int i,j,k,l,c,c1,d;
      char arr[50005],brr[50005],crr[50005],drr[50005],swap;
      scanf("%d",&t);
      while(t--)
      {
      	int count[26] = {0}, count1[26] = {0};
      	scanf("%s",arr);
      	scanf("%s",brr);
      	k = strlen(arr);
      	l = strlen(brr);
      	for(i=0;i<k;i++)
      	{
      		crr[i] = arr[i];
      	}
      	crr[i] = '\0';
      	for(j=0;j<l;j++)
      	{
      		drr[j] = brr[j];
      	}
      	drr[j] = '\0';
      	c = 0,c1 = 0;
      	while (crr[c] != '\0')
		   {
		      if (crr[c] >= 'a' && crr[c] <= 'z') 
		         count[crr[c]-'a']++;
		 
		      c++;
		   }
		   while (drr[c1] != '\0')
		   {
		      if (drr[c1] >= 'a' && drr[c1] <= 'z') 
		         count1[drr[c1]-'a']++;
		 
		      c1++;
		   }
		   flag = 1;
		   if(k == l)
		   {
		   	for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		   	{
		   		if(count[i] != count1[i])
		   		{
		   			flag = 0;
		   		}
		   	}
		   	if(flag)
		   	{
		   		printf("YES\n");
		   	}
		   	else
		   	{
		   		printf("NO\n");
		   	}
		   }
		   else
		   {
		   	printf("NO\n");
		   }
      }
	return 0;
}
